- **No Episodes of Apnea or Bradycardia Recorded.**  

**Plan:**  
- Continue respiratory monitoring and management in NICU; adjust FiO₂ settings as needed.  
- Follow up on blood gas analyses and adjust ventilation support accordingly.  
- Monitor for any changes in respiratory status; further evaluations as warranted.
